# memoato (llms.txt)
Last updated: 2026-02-08

memoato is a minimal habit tracker built for low friction and ADHD brains. It helps you log quickly, see progress, and review your day in a timeline.

Key links:
- Homepage: https://memoato.com/
- App: https://app.memoato.com/
- Help & FAQ: https://memoato.com/help
- ADHD-friendly: https://memoato.com/adhd
- Minimal habit tracker: https://memoato.com/minimal-habit-tracker
- Privacy-first: https://memoato.com/privacy-first
- Changelog: https://memoato.com/changelog
- About: https://memoato.com/about
- Timeline (blog): https://memoato.com/blog/timeline
- Privacy modes (blog): https://memoato.com/blog/privacy-modes
- Privacy policy: https://memoato.com/privacy
- Open source: https://memoato.com/open-source
- GitHub repo: https://github.com/hrvojepavlinovic/memoato-app
- Contact: https://memoato.com/contact

Product highlights:
- Templates (starter trackers) to reduce decision fatigue
- Notes is a built-in system category (cannot be deleted)
- Storage modes: cloud sync, encrypted cloud, local-only
- PWA friendly (Add to Home Screen); mobile apps are in progress
